title: Looking for some one play together!
body: I am looking for some friend play LOL together even play rank. And I am sure I can help u win every game.  Want win or want friend, just add my id : Bleve

replies.body:
I also am looking for a friend to que up with.

Primarily play ranked, Solo Q, my highest rating has been silver, & Previously I was an active member of several facebook communities for League of Legends which have all since died out.

Would be keen for some new friends to play with.
